xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree
Class SplitStrategy<D,K>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree.SplitStrategy<D,K>
Type Parameters:
D - Type of the data which is going to be stored in leaf nodes of B+Tree
K - Type of key objects
All Implemented Interfaces:
Splitter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShortestKeyStrategy
public abstract class SplitStrategy<D,K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Splitter

Skeleton class which provides basic functionality for implementing own split strategies for @see VariableLengthBPlusTree
